item.title: LeetCode 743. Network Delay Time
item.author: gycggd@gmail.com (Guo, Yuchen)
item.description: 这题是一道用BFS或者DFS就可以解决的问题。 直接上暴力DFS的代码代码: class Solution: def networkDelayTime(self, times, N, K): """ :type times: List[List[int]] :type N: int :type K: int :rtype: int """ visited = {} l = [(K, 0)] # dic[i
